items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a new message that is not part of a session.

items.name: init(session: MSSession)
items.desc: Initializes a new message that is part of the provided session.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A localized string that describes the message.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error object describing why the system failed to send the message.

items.name: var isPending: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the message is pending or whether it has been sent or received.

items.name: var layout: MSMessageLayout?
items.desc: A layout object that defines the messageâ€™s appearance.

items.name: var senderParticipantIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A UUID identifying the participant that sent the message.

items.name: var session: MSSession?
items.desc: The session that this message belongs to.

items.name: var shouldExpire: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the message should expire after being read.

items.name: var summaryText: String?
items.desc: A succinct description of the message.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: A URL that encodes data to be transmitted with the message.
